Package org.zaproxy.zap.utils

Class ZapResourceBundleControl

java.lang.Object
java.util.ResourceBundle.Control
org.zaproxy.zap.utils.ZapResourceBundleControl
public class ZapResourceBundleControl extends ResourceBundle.Control
A ResourceBundle.Control that reverts the language mappings done by the Locale class when creating bundle names, so that the resources can have the newer ISO 639 language codes.

It does the following mappings:

  • in to id
  • iw to he
  • ji to yi
Since:
2.8.0
See Also:
  • Locale(String)
